source_comments: Sheesh and I thought the Cursed Child was a bad sequel.
That explains a lot.
That’s a weird outfit. I confidently say this as a fashion stylist.

So my cousin had the Clash of Ninja 2 game and I was watching him play and played some on his system. I got hooked on the game and loved Ino and Sasuke’s fighting styles where as Naruto was really slow to move with and I just found his “Believe it’s!” to be annoying. So I ended up just hating Naruto because of that. So one day I was playing story mode and I was like hey this is pretty good. This is a show I should check it out. I was hooked episode one. That is such a strong episode and episode 2 is the funniest thing I’ve ever seen. Naruto (the character) completely won me over in the first episode. I had bought a few of the other games before that because I love Clash of Ninja 2 so much but I started watching in summer of 2009 so I was able to binge the entire part 1. It was great. 😁 It’s been one of my absolute favorite fandoms ever since. I love how it’s so deep and yet so funny. So relatable. It was my first ever anime so I’d never seen something of the sort before and honestly I’ve never seen an anime quite do it justice like Naruto. I hear people say that all Shonen is the same but it’s not.
Amrit from Kali: Call of Darkness is very flirty but my personal preference is for Killian ☺️
The Oblivion ending….😭😭😭 As a Lawrence fan I hated every season except for 1. 1 was amazing.

I still feel like that’s a Harry song 😂

I think some of y’all are missing the point. The kids Kakashi are talking about don’t have to be younger than Naruto currently. They could’ve been younger than Naruto in the past and still be stronger at that age like Itachi at age 11.
My thoughts exactly. Great job!
Naruto. I’ll just give him some ramen and he’ll be good. Maybe talk no Jutsu him 😂
The only thing that’s true for me with Harry is my personality 😂 That’s true to a fault.

1. Naveen is a narcissist. Why do people like him? Genuinely. This is highly concerning. 

2. The music is bad. That’s my opinion more than a fact since I hate jazz but it is my criticism. I don’t like one single song. Not even remotely. 

3. The color palette is drab. 

4. The swamp is not a fun setting.

5. They waste the perfectly good setting of New Orleans to replace it with the time in the swamp which feels extremely dragged out. 

6. None of the side characters, minus Tiana’s parents and Lottie are funny or interesting. Ray Louis, Naveen, and Mama Odie are painful to watch. Painful. 

7. They pretty much waste the best character and relationship in the story which is Tiana and Lottie. Swap out the story in the swamp and make Lottie involved. 

8. Give Naveen and the side characters some bigger character growth. 

9. The old guy pretending to be Naveen and hitting on Lottie is creepy. 

10. The movie really felt like a waste of time. What substantial things happened throughout the middle of the movie?

11. They wasted Tiana’s relationships with her mom too. Show more of her family dynamic. Lottie and Tiana and Tiana and her parents were the best part of the movie. 

12. Tiana seems too perfect. Give her more flaws to overcome and grow from instead of just sloppily making her challenge be becoming human again. Give us more depth to the story. 

13. The story lacks any real depth after they become frogs and is replaced by cheap comedy and gross frog content. 

14. They spend WAYYY too much time as frogs. It’s drawn out. Make it so halfway through the movie or so they turn human again and it shows that Naveen was just using Tiana only for her to be kind to him when she finds this out. He’ll leave but her kindness will stick with him and then he’ll try to become a kinder person. Make it believable. Show us that kindness can really impact people and change lives. Not that he’s being nice because he’s forced to spend time with her. Have him get what he wants first and realize it isn’t what he really wants. Have him go to cooking school or something and come back years later all so he could work for her because he wants to impact her life in the way she did his. I don’t know. 

15. Voodoo is a real thing and it’s scary. That stuff is not to be messed with and that’s what makes it so scary as the villain’s power; it’s too real. Just like Frollo as a villain or Mother Gothel’s gaslighting. 

16. It honestly just isn’t interesting after they become frogs. The characters aside from Tiana and Lottie aren’t compelling, the story is bland, the jokes are bad, the setting is dull, there’s too much monotony and it feels like 75% at least of the movie is wasted on useless things. What makes a good Disney movie is if it appeals to all ages. I was 13 when this movie came out but it has never once appealed to me where as the majority of animated Disney movies do.

17. I can understand the criticisms about Tiana being the first black princess and spending most of the movie as a frog. It looks kind of bad.

I’m not into women so just none of the female LIs since I only see them as friends, nor any of the demon characters. My only exception is Paulina. I love her. ❤️ But with a male MC I didn’t play as myself but as a character so it’s a bit different. 

Theodora - I can only be with Lawrence or Friedrich. I don’t like anyone else and can only stay loyal even if…ya know. 😭😭

Amrit - I hate that guy so much. I’m curious as to why people love him but I also love Killian so I just can’t see myself straying from him so in that sense any other LIs as well. 

Kamal - He gives me the ick because he’s so much older and has such a big brother role. I did choose many of the romance scenes with him for the longest time and while he’s a good LI I can’t get past how creepy it is. 

Diego - Why is he even a choice??

Anyone from Wave Patrol or MHS. I just don’t like those books. 

I’m only in season 2 of CY but I really hope there are more LIs because I really just don’t like any of them. 

Sherlock - He looks terrifying and gives me SK vibes. I was stunned to learn that he was Sherlock. 

PSI - Anyone other than Kay. He’s literally the only character I like in the entire book. I’m not even sure I can actually keep reading it I dislike everyone else so much. 

Ozar - I’ve done most of his romance scenes and I just don’t like him. I don’t generally like cocky guys but I do like Volot and Dragan, I think Dragan was a huge jerk for most of it but he always really intrigued me as a character.
Issues? I’m curious as to what these issues are after hearing all this about the Amen route. I DESPISE Amrit. Boy do I love Kieran and Livius though.
As I Christian I can’t even play that book but I’d never in a million years be with him. Never.
I completely agree with your Theodora opinions
I DESPISE Amrit! Killian all the way!!
I love SitF but I totally agree

He didn’t need help grounding him back to reality. He needed love and support because of his depression. People easily write Yoosung off because of his obsession with Rika when he’s clearly depressed and grieving. It’s a lack of empathy or understanding for his mental health, which would be one thing if it were just with him as a character, but it happens all the time in real life. A lot of people don’t care one bit or don’t care enough about other’s mental health or the struggles and extreme concerns that mental health can and do cause. It’s not taken seriously and that’s a tragedy. People lose their lives because more people don’t take it seriously or just don’t understand. Just because you can’t see it in the same way as you can with a physical illness doesn’t mean that it can’t be just as, or even more dangerous. I say this and feel so strongly about it because I almost lost my life to it. I didn’t have support. I relate a lot to Yoosung, and while he’s a fictional character I see this as an opportunity to spread awareness for mental health and to encourage people to be more compassionate about it. Just because someone may look fine doesn’t mean they are. One of the worst things you can do is nothing. Just reach out and say how you care from time to time. Loving that person and staying by their side is what they need more than anything. So Jumin didn’t stand by in 707’s route. He took action. And that’s what more people need in their lives. But I agree. ☺️ I feel the same exact way as you. Yoosung was my first route as well!
As someone who suffered with severe depression for 4 years absolutely no. Yoosung needed help. One of the worst things you can do for a person with depression is nothing.

B. His rapping and perviness piss me off. Jiraiya’s only negative trait is his pervy behavior while B is annoying in every single way. His only redeemable qualities are his fighting skills.
I love him! He’s hilarious! He was like the Naruto of Taka.
It would’ve been better had Sakura actually meant she loved Naruto when she told him and realized that he had been there all along while Sasuke hadn’t. Give her some character growth.

As a shy girl myself I absolutely hate how they portrayed Hinata. Girl didnt have to be a weak and spineless stalker. Couldn’t they have least have shown her doing something nice for him like drawing him a picture but being too shy to give it to him yet Naruto ends up finding it anyway or just saying hi every so often or finally having enough of the bullying and standing up for him or giving him the dessert one time from her lunch? Just ONE kind interaction? That would’ve given a basis for their relationship because I have absolutely no reason to ship them. None. She can be shy without being a flustered mess every time Naruto is around. If even a shy girl can’t relate to her that’s pretty darn sad.

I like Kiba too!! It makes me so sad to see how many people hate him! I mean yeah, it’s hilarious how often he uses Fang Over Fang but most people have techniques they use all the time? I mean look at Naruto and his use of [Multi] Shadow Clone Jutsu and Rasengan. Pretty much every character has 2 main jutsus that they use. That’s a pathetic reason to hate him. Sure, he’s not as strong as Naruto or even Shino, but he’s stronger than Hinata. I think the reason why she’s so loved and Kiba isn’t because the majority of fans are guys and a lot of them think she’s hot. Also, what’s wrong with a guy who loves his dog? That’s an extremely redeemable quality.
I don’t think it’s percentage because I have way more for Volot than Minhyuk but I still have Minhyuk on my screen

I mean Tangled, Mulan, Beauty and the Beast, and Aladdin are the best Disney movies ever if not some of the best movies ever. The Little Mermaid is good but not in the same realm as the others. I think so many people are just saying Tangled because it’s not a part of their childhood like The Little Mermaid was and nostalgia can blind us. Take nostalgia out and genuinely say which movie is the worst out of these four. Worst characters, worst character development, worst romance, worst side characters. It’s not Tangled.

The thing is it isn’t funny. I’ve been a part of the fandom since 2016 and I love Yoosung. I relate to him having struggled with loss and severe depression. It would be one thing if you’d hear it occasionally, but as often as we do it’s just not funny. People clearly do need to hear that he’s depressed and grieving because if you truly believed that this joke wouldn’t still be made and he would be praised for being deep like the twins.

Truth of the matter is people tend to be attracted to qualities that they admire. Yoosung admires certain qualities about Rika. I could admire that my cousin is hardworking or compassionate or something and like someone with those same traits without being attracted to my cousin.

I’m so sick of people clearly misunderstanding Yoosung as a character. I think the people saying this just haven’t been through grief frankly since he’s very obviously grieving and depressed. It’s not funny to joke about depression or losing a loved one. They’re very serious matters and as someone who’s struggled with them both I can really appreciate Yoosung as a character and feel very seen with him.
